casebody.data:
WALKER
v.
KNATS CREEK NURSERY, INC. 39P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Mr. Russell F. Walker, for Walker, Russell F. Mr. Arthur M. Blue, Carthage, Attorney at Law, for Knats Creek Nursery, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of July 2018 by Defendant for Sanctions:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
